fields.name: subjectkey
fields.description: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject

fields.name: src_subject_id
fields.description: Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project

fields.name: interview_date
fields.description: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY

fields.name: interview_age
fields.description: Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
fields.notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

fields.name: camm_1
fields.description: I get upset with myself for having feelings that don't make sense.
fields.notes: 4 = Never True; 3 = Rarely True; 2 = Sometimes True; 1 = Often True; 0 = Always True

fields.name: camm_2
fields.description: At school, I walk from class to class without noticing what I'm doing.
fields.notes: 4 = Never True; 3 = Rarely True; 2 = Sometimes True; 1 = Often True; 0 = Always True

fields.name: camm_3
fields.description: I keep myself busy so I don't notice my thoughts or feelings.
fields.notes: 4 = Never True; 3 = Rarely True; 2 = Sometimes True; 1 = Often True; 0 = Always True

fields.name: camm_4
fields.description: I tell myself that I shouldn't feel the way I'm feeling.
fields.notes: 4 = Never True; 3 = Rarely True; 2 = Sometimes True; 1 = Often True; 0 = Always True

fields.name: camm_5
fields.description: I push away thoughts that I don't like.
fields.notes: 4 = Never True; 3 = Rarely True; 2 = Sometimes True; 1 = Often True; 0 = Always True

fields.name: camm_6
fields.description: It's hard for me to pay attention to only one thing at a time.
fields.notes: 4 = Never True; 3 = Rarely True; 2 = Sometimes True; 1 = Often True; 0 = Always True

fields.name: camm_7
fields.description: I get upset with myself for having certain thoughts.
fields.notes: 4 = Never True; 3 = Rarely True; 2 = Sometimes True; 1 = Often True; 0 = Always True

fields.name: camm_8
fields.description: I think about things that have happened in the past instead of thinking about things that are happening right now.
fields.notes: 4 = Never True; 3 = Rarely True; 2 = Sometimes True; 1 = Often True; 0 = Always True

fields.name: camm_9
fields.description: I think that some of my feelings are bad and that I shouldn't have them.
fields.notes: 4 = Never True; 3 = Rarely True; 2 = Sometimes True; 1 = Often True; 0 = Always True

fields.name: camm_10
fields.description: I stop myself from having feelings that I don't like.
fields.notes: 4 = Never True; 3 = Rarely True; 2 = Sometimes True; 1 = Often True; 0 = Always True
